alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 9:30PM EDT until May 19 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR SWITZERLAND...CARROLL...NORTHWESTERN OWEN AND WESTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 929 PM EDT, radar showed that the storms that initially prompted the warning had weakened. However, additional storms moving northeast at 40 mph into the warned area were strengthening. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Vevay, Warsaw, Florence, Kentucky Speedway, Ghent, Sanders, Sparta, Worthville, Prestonville, Center Square, Braytown, Interstate 71 at Mile Marker 52, Langstaff, Wheatley, Locust, Markland, Moorefield, New Liberty and Quercus Grove. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 39 and 59. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
